text: Mata anata no omo ga (sakini) tenshi-tachi ni mukatte,`hontoni ware wa, chijo ni dairi-sha o okudearou.' To ose rareta toki o omoiokose. Kare-ra wa moshiageta. `Anata wa chijo de aku o okonai, chiwonagasu-sha o oka reru nodesu ka. Watashi-tachi wa, anata o tataete 唱念 Shi, mata anata no shinsei o Jo Bi shite imasu no ni.' Kare wa ose rareta. `Hontoni ware wa anata gataga shiranai koto o shitte iru
